p: Nowadays, the use of phytomedicine has become an essential type of therapy in our modern life due to its importance in the treatment and prophylaxis of several illnesses [ 1]. Obviously, their use has existed since ancient civilizations and has been utilized as conventional and complementary types of therapies [ 2]. Moreover, due to their influence on many systems in the human body, most of the prescribed medicines nowadays are originated from plants [ 3]. Many studies have shown that most people have consider that natural medicine is safe but they are not aware that their use may be accompanied with many adverse effects, even worse, they may lead to death in some cases [ 4, 5].
